text: “apage deviyane! (apage paramparaven vu) ovunta obage ayavan samudiranaya kara penva, dharmayada gnanayada ovunta uganva di, ovunva parisuddha kara tæbiya hæki rasulvarayeku ovungenma ovun atare ikut vimata salasvanu mænava! niyata vasayen obama imahat bala sampannayeku ha itamat nuvanættekuda vasayen sitinnehiya” (yayida prarthana kalaha)
